a, b, x = map(int, input().split())

print(x - a - b * (x // b))

def main():
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    print(x - a - b * (x - a) // b)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

X = int(input())
A = int(input())
B = int(input())

print(X - A - B * (X - A) // B)

import sys

x = int(sys.stdin.readline())
a = int(sys.stdin.readline())
b = int(sys.stdin.readline())

print(x - a) % b

x, a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(x-(a+b))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    print(x - a - b * (x - a) // b)

import sys

def main():
    X = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    A = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    B = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    print(X-A-(X-A)//B*B)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
